docs.text: Welcome to Fine-Tuning SAM Documentation The documentation contains an explanation of the codes fine tuning process and preperation of scripts for production. Commands To start and load the live server run; * mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. * mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. * mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Helpers Contain helper functions provided by facebookresearch . show masks show image masks in an image. show box shows bounding boxes relating to an object in an image
docs.title: Helpers

docs.text: Plots This part of the project focuses on plotting images of the ground truth and the masked images after the model. Note: Expand this section by considering the folowing points. - Plot ground truth masks - Plot image of sam masks vs fine tuned hand in hand - Plot training loss mean graph - Compare plots of sam vs fine-tuned image mask comparison
